summary: VIN# 4TH DIGIT Z, CLOTH, 6-WAY, W/AIR BAG, DRIVER-SIDE, BUCKET SEAT BEGAN TO ROCK WHILE MAKING CORNERS AND STOP/STARTS, AND SANK TO MY RIGHT.  DEALER'S NEW REP SAYS BROKEN FRAME.  I SAY I'VE NEVER WEIGHED OVER 140 LBS, WHAT ABOUT THAT?  SAYS, WELDS FAIL.  DEALER QUOTES $1300 TO FIX "SUPPORT BAR BROKEN IN HALF.  DEALTER WILL NOT INSTALL 2ND HAND BUCKET SEAT, BECAUSE WILL NOT/CAN NOT GUARANTEE.  BUCKET IS NOT CURRENTLY FIXED.  I AM RESEARCHING OPTIONS.
